alert.note: Alert for Denali (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 12 at 5:39AM AKDT until April 13 at 6:00AM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow occuring, with blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches. Areas of low visibility tonight with north winds gusting to 30 mph. * WHERE...Denali. * WHEN...Until 6 AM AKDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Snow drifts will form. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will continue through tonight. The heaviest snow will be south of the Denali Park Entrance. There will be gusty north winds and areas of low visibility in blowing snow tonight. Snow will taper off early Thursday. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. &&
